command.text: select "StudentSchoolAssociation"."StudentEnrollmentID" "StudentEnrollmentID" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEntryGradeLevelId" "RefEntryGradeLevelID" ,"RefEntryGradeLevel"."Description" "GL" ,"RefEntryGradeLevel"."SortOrder" "GLSO" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefPublicSchoolResidence" "RefPublicSchoolResidence" ,"RefPublicSchoolResidence"."Description" "HomeGroup" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEnrollmentStatusId" "RefEnrollmentStatusID" ,"RefEnrollmentStatus"."Description" "RefEnrollmentStatusDescription" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEntryTypeID" "RefEntryTypeID" ,"RefEntryType"."Description" "EntryType" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefExitGradeLevel" "RefExitGradeLevel" ,"RefExitGradeLevel"."Description" "WGL" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefExitOrWithdrawalStatusId" "RefExitOrWithdrawalStatusID" ,"RefExitOrWithdrawalStatus"."Description" "ExitOrWithdrawalStatus" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."ExitOrWithdrawTypeId" "ExitOrWithdrawTypeID" ,"ExitOrWithdrawType"."Description" "ExitOrWithdrawTypeDescription" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEndOfTermStatusId" "RefEndOfTermStatusID" ,"RefEndOfTermStatus"."Description" "EndOfTermStatus" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."EntryGradeLevelReasonID" "EntryGradeLevelReasonID" ,"EntryGradeLevelReason"."Description" "EntryReason" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefSchoolStreamID" "RefSchoolStreamID" ,"RefSchoolStream"."Description" "STM" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefFoodServiceEligibilityIds" "RefFoodServiceEligibilityIds" ,"RefFoodServiceEligibilityIds"."Description" "FoodServices" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefPromotionReasonId" "RefPromotionReasonID" ,"RefPromotionReason"."Description" "PromotionReason" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."EnrolledDate" "EnrolledDate" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."ExitWithdrawDate" "ExitWithdrawDate" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."CalendarSessionID" "CalendarSessionID" ,"CalendarSession"."SessionCode" "Session" ,"CalendarSession"."IsActive" "CSIA" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."CreatedDate" "CreatedDate" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."ModifiedDate" "ModifiedDate" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."OrganizationPersonRoleID" "OrganizationPersonRoleID" ,"OrganizationPersonRole"."OrganisationID" "OrganizationPersonRoleOrganisationID" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."Status" "Status" ,"Person"."IdentificationCode" "UPN" ,"Person"."FirstName" "Firstname" ,"Person"."LastName" "Lastname" ,"RefSex"."Code" "Sex" ,"OrganizationCalendar"."CurrentSchoolYear" "CSY" ,"OrganizationCalendar"."SchoolYearStartDate" "YSD" ,"OrganizationCalendar"."SchoolYearEndDate" "YED" ,"StudentSchoolAssociation"."MarkedForDeletion" "MarkedForDeletion" from "dbo"."StudentSchoolAssociation" "StudentSchoolAssociation" left join "dbo"."zlkpGradeLevel" "RefEntryGradeLevel" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEntryGradeLevelId" = "RefEntryGradeLevel"."RefGradeLevelId" left join "dbo"."zlkpPublicSchoolResidence" "RefPublicSchoolResidence" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefPublicSchoolResidence" = "RefPublicSchoolResidence"."RefPublicSchoolResidenceId" left join "dbo"."zlkpEnrollmentStatus" "RefEnrollmentStatus" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEnrollmentStatusId" = "RefEnrollmentStatus"."RefEnrollmentStatusId" left join "dbo"."zlkpEntryType" "RefEntryType" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEntryTypeID" = "RefEntryType"."RefEntryTypeId" left join "dbo"."zlkpGradeLevel" "RefExitGradeLevel" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefExitGradeLevel" = "RefExitGradeLevel"."RefGradeLevelId" left join "dbo"."zlkpExitOrWithdrawalStatus" "RefExitOrWithdrawalStatus" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefExitOrWithdrawalStatusId" = "RefExitOrWithdrawalStatus"."RefExitOrWithdrawalStatusId" left join "dbo"."zlkpExitOrWithdrawalType" "ExitOrWithdrawType" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."ExitOrWithdrawTypeId" = "ExitOrWithdrawType"."RefExitOrWithdrawalTypeId" left join "dbo"."zlkpEndOfTermStatus" "RefEndOfTermStatus" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefEndOfTermStatusId" = "RefEndOfTermStatus"."RefEndOfTermStatusId" left join "dbo"."zlkpNonPromotionReason" "EntryGradeLevelReason" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."EntryGradeLevelReasonID" = "EntryGradeLevelReason"."RefNonPromotionReasonId" left join "dbo"."zlkpSchoolStream" "RefSchoolStream" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefSchoolStreamID" = "RefSchoolStream"."RefSchoolStreamID" left join "dbo"."zlkpFoodServiceEligibility" "RefFoodServiceEligibilityIds" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefFoodServiceEligibilityIds" = "RefFoodServiceEligibilityIds"."RefFoodServiceEligibilityId" left join "dbo"."zlkpPromotionReason" "RefPromotionReason" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."RefPromotionReasonId" = "RefPromotionReason"."RefPromotionReasonId" left join "dbo"."Session" "CalendarSession" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."CalendarSessionID" = "CalendarSession"."CalendarSessionID" left join "dbo"."Calendar" "OrganizationCalendar" on "CalendarSession"."OrganizationCalendarID" = "OrganizationCalendar"."OrganizationCalendarId" left join "dbo"."OrganizationPersonRole" "OrganizationPersonRole" on "StudentSchoolAssociation"."OrganizationPersonRoleID" = "OrganizationPersonRole"."OrganizationPersonRoleID" left join "dbo"."Person" "Person" on "OrganizationPersonRole"."PersonID" = "Person"."PersonID" left join "dbo"."zlkpSex" "RefSex" on "Person"."RefSexID" = "RefSex"."GenderID"

field.label: Ref Exit Or Withdrawal Status Id

field.label: Ref End Of Term Status Id

action.confirmation: This action will enroll students in the upcoming academic term without promotion. Do you want to continue ?
action.data: EXECUTE [dbo].[usp_ops_non_promotion_enrollment] SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentSchoolAssociation", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students promotion process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully'

action.confirmation: This action will enroll students in the upcoming academic term with promotion to next Grade Level. Do you want to continue ?
action.data: EXECUTE usp_ops_promotion_enrollment SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentSchoolAssociation", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students promotion to next grade level ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully'

action.confirmation: This action would refresh student contacts with the appropriate Grade Level information. Are you sure you want to continue ?
action.data:
/* Version Date : Description sync year group Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_Refresh = 1

action.confirmation: This action would un-enroll selected students from school's registered list. Are you sure you want to continue ?
action.data:
/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- Step 1 ================================================================================ -- Set the ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) for MarkedForDeletion = 1 --======================================================================================== UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) --SELECT * FROM StudentSchoolAssociation ssa INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID WHERE ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 AND ssa.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 2 ================================================================================ -- Set ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate for Person table --======================================================================================== UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' -- SELECT * from Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID where ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 3 ================================================================================== -- Reset the MarkedForDeletion Flag to 0 --========================================================================================== UPDATE StudentSchoolAssociation SET MarkedForDeletion = 0
/* Version Date : Description Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
-- Step 4 ================================================================================== -- Refresh the Person table and set the attributes for current students --========================================================================================== EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students expiration process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' SET @Result_Refresh = 1

businessRules.rule: // Refresh the current screen after executing the stored procedure $app.touch.refresh();
